name: arxiv
description: arXiv API for academic paper search, metadata retrieval, and citation discovery

auth.note: arXiv API is freely accessible. Optional API key for higher rate limits.

tools.name: search_papers
tools.description: Search for academic papers by keywords, authors, categories, or date range

parameters.search_query: Search query using arXiv query syntax (e.g., 'all:machine learning AND cat:cs.AI')
parameters.id_list: Comma-separated list of arXiv IDs to retrieve specific papers
parameters.max_results: Maximum number of results to return (default 10, max 100)

tools.name: get_paper
tools.description: Retrieve full metadata for a specific paper by arXiv ID

parameters.arxiv_id: The arXiv ID of the paper (e.g., '2301.07041')

tools.name: search_by_category
tools.description: Search papers within a specific arXiv category

parameters.category: arXiv category (e.g., cs.AI, cs.CL, stat.ML, q-bio.BM)

rate_limits.note: arXiv enforces a 3-second delay between requests. The MCP server handles this automatically with request queuing.

notes: arXiv MCP server is recommended for academic mode research. It provides access to over 2 million pre-prints and published papers across physics, mathematics, computer science, biology, finance, and statistics. Rate limiting is strict -- plan for 20 queries per minute maximum. For medical research, supplement with PubMed.
